lines.text: create long longs n and k
read standard input to n and k
x is a new long long variable
print x , " " , x * k , " " and n - x * k - x
lines.code: cout << x << " " << x * k << " " << n - x * k - x << endl ;

errors.err_msg: invalid conversion from ‘const char*’ to ‘long long int’ [-fpermissive]
